name: Android Multiplayer Battleship
description:
This is my internship project about computer networks, AI and mobile games.

To play singleplayer place your ships and tap to Start and the game begins.

To play multiplayer, the host device must open hotspot wifi and the other player connect to them. After connection, tap to "Start as Host" on host device, tap "Join as Client" on other player and tap new IP written button to join game. When both players place their ships and tap ready the game begins.
